Topic.Title: Reason y IBM not participating in day to day gains

Message.Msg: IBM started 2013 at $191! Today it will trade at $212! That is a pretty good return for three months...

Topic.Title: Reason y IBM not participating in day to day gains

Message.Msg: "is because the investment community is expecting another analyst "miss"." The av estimate for operating EPS is $3.05 which would be up 9.7%. IBM should hit that. The issue is international demand and outlook for the rest of the year.
UBS upgraded IBM target $235. That flies in the face of the shorts.

Message.Title: I think STBV is about to go to $1+
Message.Msg: Looks like volume and momentum are really starting to pick up on STBV. I bet STBVwont stay this cheap for long
$3 bucks and climbing. Nice run and etching closer to that all time high.

Topic.Title: when is NEXT round of layoffs ?

Message.Msg: Layoffs in the US continue under the radar...goal is to reduce US HQ by 2015. Shutting down Mfg in Rochester MN, continued focus on all US employees who are eligible for the prior pension plan...big hit by end of 2013 with those that signed up for the transition to retirement program last year.

Topic.Title: when is NEXT round of layoffs ?

Message.Msg: "Layoffs in the US continue under the radar...goal is to reduce US HQ by 2015. Shutting down Mfg in Rochester MN, continued focus on all US employees who are eligible for the prior pension plan...big hit by end of 2013 with those that signed up for the transition to retirement program last year.' This was important enough to make up a new ID to post. You're the YRCW trucking company geek -- you have dive bombed here before. Did you switch to driving a truck after your layoff? Do you get emails from IBM HR as a heads up for the rest of us? Inquiring minds wanna know.
